configStructure.name: templateOne
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by '#'. Please omit ';', when writing an action if the action is a statement, e.g., write 'p=10' instead of 'p=10;'. To add or clauses use '|'. To check many properties of this type, separate properties by ';'. For example, write p1#q1|q3;p2#q2 to check properties 1) p1 cannot happen after q1 or q3 and 2) p2 cannot happen after q2.

configStructure.name: templateTwo
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by '#'. Please omit ';', when writing an action if the action is a statement, e.g., write 'p=10' instead of 'p=10;'. To add or clauses use '|'. To check many properties of this type, separate properties by ';'.

configStructure.name: templateThree
configStructure.displayName: Type 3: If <action> happens, <action> can happen only after <action> happens
configStructure.description: Specify actions separated by '#'. Please omit ';', when writing an action if the action is a statement, e.g., write 'p=10' instead of 'p=10;'. To add or clauses use '|'. To check many properties of this type, separate properties by ';'.
